summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Center; authorizing the sale of real property on 5th Avenue North, commonly known as Seattle Center Parking Lot 2, to Iris Holdings, LLC ("Iris") and providing for Iris to construct a City parking garage on a portion of the site; authorizing the Seattle Center Director to execute a Purchase Agreement and other documents; amending the 2005-10 Adopted Capital Improvement Program; providing for the deposit and transfer of monies and making various appropriations for various Seattle Center purposes from various funds; and establishing a subfund of the Seattle Center Redevelopment and Parks Community Center Fund; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
